trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The GridTableStylesCollection contains <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects that allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control to display a customized grid style for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 您包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>的物件，可讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控制項來顯示每個<xref:System.Data.DataTable><xref:System.Data.DataSet>。</xref:System.Data.DataSet></xref:System.Data.DataTable>自訂的格線樣式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property returns the GridTableStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>屬性會傳回您。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: By default, the GridTableStylesCollection does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您不包含任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>會顯示每個資料表使用的色彩、 寬度和格式設定的預設設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: All columns of each table are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示每個資料表的所有資料行。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is added to the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to determine which object supplies the data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>加入至集合，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>來判斷哪些物件會提供資料方格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> must match the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，其中包含三個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>必須符合<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的其中一個物件。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> does not match any of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> settings will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>不符合任何<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>值、 預設設定將用來顯示每個資料表的資料和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>設定將被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the GridTableStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 一定要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並將其新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>加入之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>您的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>的有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值加入集合中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自動為您產生的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，發生例外狀況會擲回您嘗試加入新的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件具有重複的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製到相容的一維<xref:System.Array>，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>，是從集合複製之元素的目的地。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 複製在陣列中以零為起始的索引開始。

trans-unit.source: array is null.
trans-unit.target: array為 null。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小於零。

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: array是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: -中的項目數<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref>大於從索引到目的陣列結尾的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The type in the collection cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的類型無法自動轉換成目的陣列的類型。

trans-unit.source: The item property cannot be set.
